tab1.li1: Zenerate all possibilities of building design to maximize your success.

tab2.li1: Zenerate uses AI engine to provide building design solution on early phase.
tab2.li2: We help clients find the most optimized solution by generating millions of options.

index1.span1: Setting up project objectives utilizing plans, rent/home price, construction cost, etc.

index2.span1: Generating millions of options by using optimized algorithms for project objectives

index3.span1: Comparing options by changing project conditions in real-time on our web platform

news6.title: Zenerate Selected as Preferred Bidder for 'AI Data Voucher'
news6.contents: Zenerate has been selected as preferred bidder for the 'AI Data Voucher' program hosted by K-Data. Zenerate will be offered a $70K-worth-voucher and use it for data processing for their AI model development.

news5.title: Zenerate signed MOU with Hanlim Architecture Group
news5.contents: On August 18th 2020, Zenerate signed MOU with Hanlim Architecture Group on developing building design AI solutions and web platform.

news4.title: Zenerate secured seed funding.
news4.contents: Zenerate closed their seed round fundraising with three venture capital firms; Bluepoint Partners, Krypton and Plan.H Ventures. Bluepoint Partners and Krypton are the most established and re-known accelerators in Korea and Plan.H is a subsidiary company of Hoban Construction which is a top 10 housing providers in Korea. Krypton also invited 101 Architects, the most admirable architect in Korea, and Neovalue, the most influential lifestyle developer to their investment fund.

news3.title: The First Korea Land and Housing Corporation's Public Data Startup Idea Competition
news3.contents: Zenerate was awarded 'Honorable Mention' at 'The First Korea Land and Housing Corporation(LH)'s Public Data Startup Idea Competition'. LH is the government-owned largest housing provider in Korea and held this competition to facilitate the use of public data. Zenerate utilized LH's apartment plan data to swiftly evaluate and score apartment views by using a machine learning method. It enables to evaluate all apartments in a big apartment town and compare different apartment master plans to see which has better view scores. Zenerate will receive continuous support from LH in addition to cash prize.

news2.title: Hanyang University Campustown Startup Idea Competition Winner
news2.contents: Hanyang University and Seongdong-gu(one of 25 district governments of Seoul) held 'HY-Seongdong Campustown Startup Idea Competition', and 'Zenerate' has been awarded as one of the four finalists. There were 230 startup applicants and 35 teams were selected through application review and online presentation.

news1.title: Fastfive Signed MOU with Zenerate
news1.contents: Fastfive, the biggest Korean coworking company, signed MOU with Zenerate. They agreed to collaborate on developing a more efficient workflow and increasing business profitability in relation to space planning of coworking spaces, where Zenerate can bring in their building design AI expertise.

news0.title: Londonclub Signed MOU with Zenerate
news0.contents: Londonclub, a share-house developer and operator in South Korea, signed MOU with Zenerate. They will collaborate on evaluating and maximizing business profitability of housing development, automating construction cost estimate, and improving share-house operation efficiency.

news7.title: Zenerate was featured in Bridgenews
news7.contents: Zenerate was interviewed by and featured in Bridgenews.

news8.title: Joining the final round of COMEUP2020 Online Startup Pitch
news8.contents:
Zenerate has passed the screening for COMEUP2020 Online Startup Pitch which will be held between November 19-21. 500 Startups applied for the rookie league and Zenerate is one of the final 36 companies that were selected for the event by the expert and civilian committees. 
COMEUP is a global event organized by Minister of SMEs and Startups, Korea Institute of Startup & Entrepreneurship Development, leading startups and experts in Korea.

news9.title: Third-tier prize at Innovative Technology Competition
news9.contents: Zenerate won a third-tier prize at Innovative Technology Competition organized by Hoban Group, Korea International Trade Association, and Collaborative Growth Committee. Out of more than 200 companies, Zenerate was selected for the third-tier prize. After the initial screening, 10 companies were offered to pitch at COEX Intercontinental on Oct 29, and the result was announced on Nov 6.

news10.title: Selected for TIPS R&D
news10.contents: Zenerate has been accepted for TIPS R&D program supported by Ministry of SMEs and Startups and will be awarded $420K. TIPS provides financial supports for startup companies that were invested by private VCs and match funds upto $580K. Plan.H Ventures, one of Zenerate's angel investor, applied for this program and Zenerate has been selected for September batch.

news11.title: Runner-up Prize at HY-Seongdong Campustown Demo Day
news11.contents: Zenerate has been awarded a runner-up prize and â‚©3,000K with 10 other startups at HY-Seongdong Campustown Demo Day.

news12.title: 3rd Prize Winner at UKC's Startup Pitch Competition
news12.contents: Zenerate has been selected as 3rd prize winner for Startup Pitch Competition hosted by the US-Korea Conference (UKC). UKS held its 2nd Innovation and Entrepreneurship Symposium from December 14 - 17, 2020 as an online event and was hosted by three prestigious organizations - the Korean-American Scientists and Engineers Association (KSEA), Korean Federation of Science & Technology Societies (KOFST), and Korea-U.S. Science Cooperation Center (KUSCO).

news13.title: Selected for IBK Changong Mapo 6th Batch
news13.contents: Zenerate has been selected for Industrial bank of Korea(IBK)'s Changong Mapo(accelerator program). The selected startups will be supported by IBK in relation to angel investment, loan, venture capital as well as office space, mentoring, education, consulting, networking, marketing and promotion.

news14.title: Signed Consulting Contract with ShinYoung
news14.contents: ShinYoung(developer) signed a consulting contract with Zenerate for a mixed-use project in Yongsan, Seoul. Zenerate will find the unit mix and unit layout solution for maximizing sales revenue of a residential tower and retail space. Additionally, appropriate sales prices will be projected through Zenerate's AI solution.

news15.title: Selected for Startup Voucher
news15.contents: Zenerate has been selected as the finalist for Startup Voucher hosted by Korea International Trade Association. The program aims at startups with less than 7 years in operation to support their global business expansion and marketing to buyers and investors. $40K at maximum will be awarded to the selected startups.

about.intro: Zenerate team formed in the United States, Spring 2017, started to research on building design automation and has made many achievements such as its first application to a real project, selected as speakers at multiple conferences including American Institute of Architects Conference 2020. In Spring 2020, Bongjai Shin, architectural designer in Los Angeles, and Gahye Jeong, Ph.D. in mathematics and A.I. developer, co-founded their firm, Zenerate Inc., secured their seed funding from three venture capital firms in Korea, and offer building design AI services to the Korea and US markets. By translating building design problems to mathematical ones, they are bringing in a new way of building design and real estate development to Architecture-Engineering-Construction industries.

shin.1: He is a pioneer of integrating building design and artificial intelligence. Since forming his research group in 2017, he has led many research projects and been selected as speakers at multiple conferences including AIA 2020. He holds a bachelor of architecture degree from Hanyang university and a master in architecture degree from Harvard university.

about.jeong: She is a mathematician and A.I. developer and has led Zenerate's A.I. development. She wants to change the AEC industries with a new way of integrating building design and artificial intelligence. She holds a PhD in mathematics form Caltech and a bachelor of mathematics from Seoul national university.
